entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
